title: MCP Tool Configuration Critical Information
description: MCP tools in Claude Code are accessed directly by name without prefixes. Configuration must be in /root/.config/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json. Environment variables should use ${VARIABLE_NAME} references. Supabase requires Personal Access Token (sbp_*) not Service Key.

solution.description: Documented correct MCP tool access: Tools are called directly by name (e.g., list_tables, execute_sql) without mcp__ prefix. Configuration location: /root/.config/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json. Must use environment variable references not hardcoded keys. Supabase needs Personal Access Token.
